dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: If you got hurt in that last fight, you can switch to healing with Down on the D-Pad. Hitting arrows on the D pad can help switch between your PAINT POWERS.

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: And make sure to press R1! (づ￣ ³￣)づ

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: A little bit of PAINT will be used, but don't worry, hit some bad guys and the paint will come back soon!

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: Okay, that's the end. Unless you know how to rail grind.

dialogue.speaker: S-1GN
dialogue.text: And like, you don't know how to do that. Right?
